item.title: CVE-2022-2219|2024-08-03T00:32:08.902Z -- unknown -- unyson
item.description: The Unyson WordPress plugin before 2.7.27 does not sanitise and escape a parameter before outputting it back in the page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting
